FIFA 14 is to me the most disappointing game in the series. I know that there is a running joke about how nothing changes from year to year, but the gameplay and fluidity of FIFA 14 are stale and worse than FIFA 13. there are a number of gamebreaking bugs such as the disappearing ball glitch, which is extremely annoying since there have been hardly any bugs in previous years. All in all I would suggest people to stay away from Madden 2006, as it is essentially the same game as the previous entries in the Age of Empires series.

10/10

Психология масс — явление непостижимое, находящееся по ту сторону логики и здравого смысла. Долгожданный выход финальной версии CS: Source произвел такое разрушительное воздействие на кору головного мозга, что впору говорить об эпидемии

Played this game years ago when it was still CS 1.6, then again when source came out. Times may have changed and newer versions have come out but this game will never die. It's just that addicting, and that much fun. If you like fast paced shootem-up games. This is for you.
